title: More affordable FFWD Drift gravel & RYOT aero road wheels with stiff Two/One hubs
content:
Looking to make the already affordable carbon FFWD Drift gravel & RYOT aero road wheels even cheaper, Fast Forward has added a stiffer new Two/One hubset option for each. Dropping almost 20% off the price of each wheelset, the new hubs are said to better transfer pedal & disc brake forces for bombproof reliability on [â€¦]

The post More affordable FFWD Drift gravel & RYOT aero road wheels with stiff Two/One hubs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
